page.title: 13Elston Riding Club
page.content: The riding club started in the summer of 1983.It all happened when Mrs Merrin let people come and ride in her field.So in the six weeks holiday Mrs Connole and Mrs Merrin arranged a one day event.Everything went so well, they officialy formed a committee in October 1983.They now have 65 members from all over the place.The committee now arranges a one day event every month.There are also two lessons every Saturday by a paid instructor. The price is Â£1.50.Every member has to pay a yearly subscription of Â£2.50 .In the winter months there are tack cleaning evenings,video films,vet talks and quizes.They all take place in our club room at Mr and Mrs Walker's farm.
